summary: Bruno and Sonia, a young couple living off her benefit and the thefts committed by his gang, have a new source of money: their newborn son.
cast: Jérémie Renier|Déborah François|Jérémie Segard|Fabrizio Rongione|Olivier Gourmet|Anne Gerard|Bernard Marbaix|Jean-Claude Boniverd|Frédéric Bodson|Marie-Rose Roland|Leon Michaux|Delphine Tomson|Stéphane Marsin|Samuel De Ryck|François Olivier|Hicham Tiberkanine|Hachemi Haddad|Stéphane Bissot|Cécile Boland|Annette Closset|Alao Kasongo|Mireille Bailly|Jean-Michel Balthazar|Philippe Jeusette|Salvatore Elliséo|Carl Jadot|Olindo Bolzan|Sophia Leboutte|Bernard Garant|Bernard Geurde|Claudy Delfosse|Clément Bouchard|Noah Brisy|Dorian Cypers|Jérémy Dal Farro|Saskia De Zassetsky|Victor Debon|Julien de Keuster|Benjamen Di Prima|Amandine Gabryl|Océane Goffin|Denis Gochel|Elea Landrin|Maël Lebon|Mabille Lechantre|Aurélien Martin|Yan Muraille|Guillaume Neycken|Renaud Pirotte|Bastien Stasse|Natacha Steeman|Lou Tapai
title: El niño
